review: Froze and after it froze was never able to connect to the Internet.
author: Renee Zappitelli

review: Love this stick!  So easy to use!
author: Kindle Customer

review: Amazing!!!  Exceeded my expectations transforming my flat screen TV into a smart TV. Highly recommend the purchase of this device as an affordable alternative to purchasing a new TV that has Smart technology built in.
author: Amazon Customer

review: didn't realize it had to be plugged in
author: jfmakins

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is great. Installs easily and just plain works!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it! great internet connect speed, super easy to set up!
author: Denise Whiteside

review: If  you think you are going wireless you are not.  The dongle still needs to be plugged into a wall outlet. You still are at the mercy of the speed of your internet provider.  At least it keeps dust out of one of your hdmi slots.
author: t'nman

review: Awesome product, easy to install and use.  Streaming quality is great, would recommend this to anyone with out hesitation. Way to go Amazon!
author: Wilkey

review: Turns any Ol' TV into a smart TV. Works just like it should. Pretty neat.
author: Cathy
